summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Memory System module. All 18 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend Memory Settings page fully functional with all 6 tabs working correctly. CRUD operations for Entity Types, Lesson Types, Channel Types, and Agents all working. LLM config editing and settings updates functional.
critical_code_review_comments: GLiNER2 NER service is defined in docker-compose but not running in preview - entity extraction will fall back to LLM-based extraction
LLM API keys not configured - all LLM features (summarization, embedding, vision, PII scrubbing) will return empty results until admin configures API keys
Memory config endpoints are publicly accessible without authentication - may want to add auth for production

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all tabs, CRUD operations, and interactions working)

seed_data_creation: Default seed data already present: 3 entity types (Contact, Organization, Program), 5 lesson types, 6 channel types, 5 LLM config placeholders, default system prompts
context_for_next_testing_agent: Memory System module fully tested. All config APIs working at /api/memory/config/*. Frontend at /app/memory accessible after login. Agent API endpoints require X-API-Key header for authentication. GLiNER2 service not running in preview environment.

frontend_ui: LLM APIs tab - Shows 5 LLM configs with edit functionality
Entities tab - Shows entity types and subtypes with CRUD
Lessons tab - Shows lesson types with color indicators
Channels tab - Shows channel types with descriptions
Agents tab - Agent creation with API key display
General tab - Chunking, Lesson, PII, Rate Limiting settings
